attributes.name: Ash Armoire
attributes.description: Ash is also known as "firelight" wood, and gives off a wonderful long-burning heat due to its density. Not that you'd ever burn your beautiful ash armoire, of course.

attributes.name: Ash Bar Stool
attributes.description: This ash bar stool will support you through the good times and the bad.

attributes.name: Ash Cabinet
attributes.description: Some people claim that clothes kept in this ash wood cabinet will never go out of fashion.

attributes.name: Ash Casual Chair
attributes.description: Though it looks somewhat rickety, the ash wood in this chair makes it strong and flexible.

attributes.name: Ash Chest of Drawers
attributes.description: Just imagining all the things you could put in these tiny drawers fills you with a sense of excitement.

attributes.name: Ash Desk
attributes.description: You are a popular person with many friends. Keep in touch with all of them by writing letters at this attractive ash desk.

attributes.name: Ash Dining Chair
attributes.description: The rugged elegance of this chair elevates any home's style from 'rustic' to 'rustic chic'.

attributes.name: Ash Dresser
attributes.description: This single-source dresser was crafted from the wood of one ash tree, which had lived a long, full life with no regrets.

attributes.name: Ash End Table
attributes.description: The energy in your house seems so much lighter, now that you have this ash end table.

attributes.name: Ashen Tiger
attributes.description: Neither light nor color can escape the deep darkness of its fur. But do you know what can? Love! And this big kitty needs lots of it.

attributes.name: Ash Full Bed
attributes.description: Blue sheets and ash wood makes up this simple yet comfortable bed. However this bed isn't really full until you are napping in it.

attributes.name: Ash Large Bookcase
attributes.description: No metal fasteners were used in the joinery of this ash bookcase. Its craftsmanship is second to none.

attributes.name: Ash Large Table
attributes.description: Ash wood has natural protective and healing properties. You'll never get indigestion from food eaten off this table.

attributes.name: Ash Small Bookcase
attributes.description: The top interior decorator in Aeternum adores the weathered look of this compact ash bookcase, making it a very popular piece.

attributes.name: Ash Small Table
attributes.description: When you're not hungry enough for a full meal, this snack-sized ash dining table is just right.

attributes.name: Ash Wall Shelf
attributes.description: The flexible joints of this ash shelf can support the heaviest of collectible figurines.

attributes.name: Bamboo Display Vase
attributes.description: Which is more exquisite, the bamboo or the vase? Ah, that's a philosophical question.

attributes.name: Barkimedes' Puppy
attributes.description: The grown spawn of the great Barkimedes and a settlement Mastiff; a forbidden romance for the ages.

attributes.name: Basic Ancients Combat Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when battling certain enemies. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when fighting against 'The Ancients' and their skeletal creations.

attributes.name: Basic Angry Earth Combat Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when battling certain enemies. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when fighting against the 'Angry Earth' and their forces of nature.

attributes.name: Basic Arcana Crafting Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when making magical equipment. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using crafting stations for your 'Arcana' profession.

attributes.name: Basic Armoring Crafting Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when making various types of armor and bags. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using crafting stations for your 'Armoring' profession.

attributes.name: Basic Cooking Crafting Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when making meals and extra portions. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using crafting stations for your 'Cooking' profession.

attributes.name: Basic Corrupted Combat Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when battling certain enemies. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when fighting against the 'Corrupted' and their zealot armies.

attributes.name: Basic Engineering Crafting Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when making ranged weapons. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using crafting stations for your 'Engineering' profession.

attributes.name: Basic Fishing Gathering Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when angling for various aquatic creatures. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using a 'Fishing Pole' in the wilderness.

attributes.name: Basic Harvesting Gathering Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when reaping various plants. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using a 'Harvesting Sickle' in the wilderness.

attributes.name: Basic Logging Gathering Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when felling various trees. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using a 'Logging Axe' in the wilderness.

attributes.name: Basic Loot Luck Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when collecting the spoils of combat. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* to your luck when picking up loot and opening chests.

attributes.name: Basic Lost Combat Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when battling certain enemies. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when fighting against 'The Lost' and their decaying and spectral hordes.

attributes.name: Basic Mining Gathering Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when excavating for various ore. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using a 'Mining Pick' in the wilderness.

attributes.name: Basic Skinning Gathering Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when flaying pelts and hides. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using a 'Skinning Knife' in the wilderness.

attributes.name: Basic Weaponsmithing Crafting Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when making short-range melee weapons. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when using crafting stations for your 'Weaponsmithing' profession.

attributes.name: Basic Wildlife Combat Trophy
attributes.description:
A trophy that inspires you when battling certain enemies. 
Only works when placed in your home. 
Grants a *medium bonus* when hunting the wildlife of the island.

attributes.name: "Bear in Meadow" Painting
attributes.description: A serene oil painting in an ash wood frame. No one is quite sure how the artist got the bear in this painting to stand still for six hours.

attributes.name: Bear Pelt Rug
attributes.description: A soft and fuzzy bear rug to warm your bare feet, or to lounge upon seductively. Or both.

attributes.name: Bedsheet Curtains
attributes.description: Simple lengths you can string up on your wall or window. Your neighbors will never know that these used to be your bedsheets.

attributes.name: "Beyond the Gate" Painting
attributes.description: A haunting watercolor painting in a maple wood frame. It is so rich with atmosphere that the viewer can almost feel the chilly mist on their skin.

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Dining Table
attributes.description: Imagine how much champagne and caviar this table could hold. (And yet somehow, still not enough.)

attributes.name: Black-lacquered Galley Shelf
attributes.description: A cheeky combination of luxury and coziness that's sure to turn heads.
